product_name: National Geographic Adventure Paper - Letter - 8.5" x 11"
long_description: Letter-size National Geographic Adventure Paper lets you print your own tear-resistant, waterproof maps. Works with all major laser and inkjet printers. Writable media accepts pen and highlighter. Folds easily and prints on both sides. Photo print quality and abrasion tough. The National Geographic Adventure Paper includes 25 sheets of 8.5 x 11 in. paper.
short_description: Letter-size National Geographic Adventure Paper lets you print your own tear-resistant, waterproof maps.
